name: Hole Lotta' Trouble
description: Drive through the streets of a city on a high-speed joyride in Hole Lotta' Trouble. Watch out for the many potholes that plague the city streets in order to avoid causing lasting damage to your ride, and find a way out of the city before the police manage to spoil the fun! Created during TrainJam 2019 around the theme "Circuitous".
